short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connects your EZX site to mounted AFP and SMB volumes and allows synchronizing assets to your desktop

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NAPC EZXtend is intended for NAPC EZX web application users. By right-clicking on an asset in your EZX site and selecting one of the extension menu options, you can open the asset on AFP or SMB mounted volumes, or synchronize it to your desktop. Note that in order to function properly this extension requres EZXtend application to be installed on your computer
